citeinfo.title: Meteorological data for Disney Wilderness Preserve, Florida
Consequences and Correlates of Fire in Wetlands -- JFSP 01-1-3-09 {43FDCF46-8CA2-4FF6-8561-1DF571136A95}

descript.abstract: Daily measurements of air temperature, relative humidity and rainfall from one station and rainfall only from 4 other stations on the Preserve.
descript.purpose: Track weather conditions, especially rainfall, and compare to other datasets, especially vegetation and hydrology, to detect climactic effects on
descript.supplinf: The Disney Wilderness Preserve (DWP) in Osceola and Polk counties, Florida. Approximate bounding coordinates N: Lat 28.145 Long -81.439; S: Lat 28.029 Long -81.406; E: Lat 28.074 Long -81.373; W: Lat 28.129 Long -81.457

spdom.descgeog: Disney Wilderness Preserve in Osceola and Polk counties, Florida

idinfo.accconst: Requests for data should be directed to the DWP Research Coordinator. Data will be provided in electronic format.
idinfo.useconst: Any reports or publications presenting or referring to these datasets must be approved by the DWP Research Coordinator prior to publication. Proper credit must be given to DWP and The Nature Conservancy.

cntinfo.cntinst: DWP Research Coordinator. As of 5/19/05, this is Sandy Woiak.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.0.0.535

citeinfo.title: Consequences and Correlates of Fire in Wetlands -- JFSP 01-1-3-09 {43FDCF46-8CA2-4FF6-8561-1DF571136A95}

dataqual.complete: Rainfall measurements from the different locations are compared to each other and to the water levels recorded at those locations to check for inconsistencies. Air temperature and humidity sensors are checked against real-time data to check functionality of equipment. These data are also compared to those obtained from other nearby weather stations.

enttyp.enttypl: Daily measurements of air temperature, relative humidity and rainfall from Disney Preserve
enttyp.enttypd: Daily measurements of air temperature, relative humidity and rainfall from one station and rainfall only from 4 other stations on the Preserve.
enttyp.enttypds: The Nature Conservancy, Disney Wilderness Preserve
